text: @Alyssa_Milano Sure Alyssa, I'll translate...I am well aware your #TDS has deteriorated your abilities to comprehend things. Before COVID19, a simple trip to the doctor, for a viral or bacterial infection, was easier to treat, even if was only treating the symptoms. Understand?
